summary: SummaryMEDIHEAL Madecassoside Blemish Pad calms and helps reduce the appearance of blemishes and dark spots on uneven, post-acne skin.
details: DetailsBenefitsProven to help improve the appearance of uneven skin tone and dark spots by 16% in four weeksInstantly helps improve rough skin texture by 19%Instantly helps soothe irritated skinFeaturesMade with Gauze PadsSized (2.6") to cover a wide areaRounded corners for a perfect fit on skinKey IngredientsFormulated with MEDIHEAL's proprietary CalmingTox complex and liposome delivery system for optimal resultsMicroparticlized CalmingTo: Centella Asiatica 2-Time Extraction - Madecassoside in 2X Amounts - With Liposome-based Technology - MicroparticlizedItem 2626995How To UseAs a treatment mask: Apply on targeted areas (forehead, cheeks and chin) after cleansing for an intensive treatment. Leave on for 15 minutes, remove and let the remaining serum absorb into skin.As a treatment pad: After cleansing, gently swipe across skin to tone, moisturize and prep skin. reviews.headline: BUY THIS PRODUCT!!! Your skin will thank you
reviews.comments: I have been struggling with acne for months, and I truly believe this product is what saved my skin. Not only has it cleared up my blemishes, but it's also noticeably improved my skin texture. My skin is so much smoother now! Do yourself a favor and buy this product!

reviews.headline: Work so good
reviews.comments: Works good but don't use everyday

reviews.headline: Do not buy if acne prone skin.
reviews.comments: Caused breakouts on my chin and forehead. Don't recommend for people with acne prone skin. Also had strong fragrance.

reviews.headline: Not really that great a product
reviews.comments: I got this as a less expensive substitute for the Peter Thomas Roth version and I wish I hadn't.  They seem to be working but they stink like tea tree oil.  I hate smelling like that when I go to bed.  There are so many great natural scents out there that there is no reason cosmetics should stink.

reviews.headline: smoothens skin
reviews.comments: i went from not using any toners to this so i don't have insight on how this compares to other toners, but i did see a difference in my skin! it felt softer, but also really smothened out my skin texture. i had a lot of small bumps that went away after using this for a week everyday. it's cooling, moisturizing, and can even be used as a mask.

reviews.headline: I give it a 0
reviews.comments: I was hoping a korea skincare would help but it made my acne much worse and it was a waste of money.

reviews.headline: Rough toner pad material - Hospital Guaze
reviews.comments: Rough toner pad material. It's Guaze material, reminds me of hospital guaze. Great for exfoliating. May irritate if you have sensitive skin. I love the essence-very watery, does leave a little stickiness but goes away when I put face moisturizer on. I do have oily skin.

reviews.headline: Add on to previous review
reviews.comments: Posted a lengthy review on this and said its not good for hormonal acne, i meant to say fungal acne not hormonal, its okay for hormonal acne (i have this) and its nvr caused a problem for me. However, most likely will break you out if u have FUNGAL acne.

reviews.headline: Very  good depending on the type of skin you have
reviews.comments: I have eczema, dry but oily skin, and am acne proneâ€¦ yes ik it sucks. This is a very good product for hydration (dry skin and oily skin) especially good for people with oily skin because typically your skin is oily because its not hydrated enough so it produces more oil to try and combat that. I obviously have sensitive skin (eczema) and have never had a problem woth this, same goes with being acne prone. HOWEVER, if you have HORMONAL acne (i dont) then i would NOT recommend this product for you as it contains Polyglyceryl-10 Oleate, Saccharomyces Ferment, and Lactobacillus Ferment which are known ingredients that commonly cause a breakout im hormonal acne (typically those deep painful pimples). If you are jusy acne prone (like me) then it should not do anything bad to your skin unless you have a sensitivity or are allergic to one of the ingredients.

reviews.headline: It's Ok
reviews.comments: This toner pad is my least favorite out of the Mediheal bunch. I am not crazy about the smell which is very medicinal. It may work for some, but I won't be repurchasing this one!

reviews.headline: Hydrating
reviews.comments: Barely day 2 of using this product, definitely see a difference in my skin these past 2 days, my skin has been very hydrated and my makeup as been going on so well. I like this product alot, its worth the try.

reviews.headline: Pretty good!
reviews.comments: This is the only thing that has truly saved my skin. My skin used to break out incredibly bad and as soon as I started leaving these on my face for 10-15 minutes my face started to clear up within 2-3 weeks. It also leaves your skin very glowy and moisturized looking.

reviews.headline: Amazing
reviews.comments: Makes my skin so smooth and look so hydrated and helps my break out.

reviews.headline: LOVE IT
reviews.comments: Omg this been a game changer for my skin. My skin instantly felt soft and helped some of my blemishes. This is my new go to!!

reviews.headline: Love these
reviews.comments: My skin has been on a roller coaster since October 2024 ive been trying everythjng to get it under control but just when one pimple goes away 3 more pop up i was really losing hope & confused bc my skin usually doesnt break out like this & for so many months until i saw these read the reviews & decided to give it a try & im so glad i did my skin has been looking amazing & ive only been using these for about 2-3 weeks thank goodness for these i absolutely love them! I want to try the others they have as well but i definitely recommend!

reviews.headline: broke me out SO BAD
reviews.comments: I'm 35 and have struggles of acne here and there. My skin had been great for months, until I used this and now I have DEEP painful cystic acne all over my chin. This absolutely wrecked my skin, and I don't  usually have sensitive skin!

reviews.headline: Pass for me
reviews.comments: I usually have a couple of break outs here and there but this caused my skin to freak out. I dont have sensitive skin but my skin broke out all over in tiny bumps + more acne.

reviews.headline: Helped with my blemishes and skin barrier
reviews.comments: For reference I have combination oily T zone and dry cheek skin. I'm prone to a lot of black heads, that get irritated, pop and leave a dark scar. This has helped reduce the blackheads I get and keep my skin glowing :) very happy with this.

reviews.headline: BEST TONER PADS FOR REDUCING REDNESS OF ACNE
reviews.comments: I am now on my 2nd box buying this toner and my skin had improved so much, i had terrible hormonal acne for 2 years making my cheese extremely red. This toner pads helped my skin tremendously, my redness is almost gone and my stubborn scarfing is completely healed.

reviews.headline: Save your skin barrier the trouble
reviews.comments:
I saw this went they first arrived to ULTA and had my eye on them for a while. I WAS SOO EXITED... And then, I used them for a week and started getting the most horrible painfully breakouts.ðŸ˜•

 Although I do have acne prone/sensitive skin, I don't usually break out, unless there's an skin irritant ingredients. And welp this has a few! (At least for my skin)
